text: The Real Girl's Kitchen is an American cooking television series that aired on Cooking Channel. The series was presented by actress Haylie Duff; and it featured Duff showcasing recipes inspired by her travels to New York City, as well as her hometown of Los Angeles. The Real Girl's Kitchen premiered on August 9, 2014 and concluded on July 25, 2015, after two seasons. ==Episodes== === Season 1 (2014) === {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:60%;" |- !style="background-color: #ab5b78;
